sentences.en: Assist the product manager explore our market, popularize new products.
sentences.cn: 协助产品经理开展市场引导 、 新产品营销策划、推广促销等工作.

sentences.en: Bob Marley popularized reggae music in the 1970s.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃·马利在20世纪70年代让雷鬼音乐流行了起来。

sentences.en: Education be implementedwith two legs, not only need to popularize, also improve.
sentences.cn: 办教育要两条腿走路, 既要注意普及, 又要注意提高.

sentences.en: I have tried to popularize, rather than vulgarize the subject.
sentences.cn: 我试着使主题通俗化, 而不是庸俗化.
普及基本的常识性知识.

sentences.en: Popularize CA and the setting pattern.
sentences.cn: 推广客户自动化系统及安装模式.

sentences.en: Popularize the Olympic knowledge and disseminate the Olympic ideas through various forms.
sentences.cn: 通过多种形式普及奥林匹克知识,传播奥林匹克理念.

sentences.en: Popularize what is needed and can be readily accepted by the bourgeoisie?
sentences.cn: 用资产阶级所需要、所便于接受的东西 吗 ?

sentences.en: Proactively popularize and utilize energy - saving, recycling and environmental technologies.
sentences.cn: 积极推广和运用节能 、 利废、环保等技术.

sentences.en: Skinner was the psychologist who popularized behavior modification.
sentences.cn: 斯金纳就是那位使行为矫正概念得到普及的心理学家。

sentences.en: The company are trying to popularize their new product.
sentences.cn: 公司正极力推销新产品.

sentences.en: The international institute of internal auditors popularize the effectiveness auditing in 1978.
sentences.cn: 绩效审计是国际内部审计师协会在1978年制订《内部审计标准》之后,正式向世界各国的审计机构和审计专业人士推行的.

sentences.en: The programme did much to popularize little-known writers.
sentences.cn: 这个节目大力宣扬不太知名的作家。

sentences.en: To popularize ecological knowledge; To harmonize the relationship between human and nature.
sentences.cn: 普及生态学知识, 人与自然和谐相处!

sentences.en: We improve and popularize some results in parts of the relative references.
sentences.cn: 改进和推广了部分相关文献的结果.

sentences.en: We should popularize science on a grand scale.
sentences.cn: 我们应该大规模普及科学.

sentences.en: You must seek out the advanced experience of the masses, sum it up and popularize it.
sentences.cn: 你必须发现群众的先进经验, 并加以总结和推广.

words.tran_cn: 流行的，通俗的；受欢迎的；大众的；普及的
流行地；通俗地；普及地；大众地
流行音乐；汽水；砰然声；枪击
普及，流行；名气；受大众欢迎
大众化的人；普及读物；普及者；使普及的人
突然出现；爆开；射击；瞪大；发出爆裂声
推广，普及；使…通俗化（等于popularize）；使…受欢迎
取出；开枪打；抛出；突然伸出；突然行动

trans.tran_en: to make a difficult subject or idea able to be easily understood by ordinary people who have no special knowledge about it

trans.tran_cn: 使受欢迎，普及，使通俗化，使流行
trans.tran_en: to make a difficult subject or idea able to be easily understood by ordinary people who have no special knowledge about it
